extendedInfo.description: THIS THEME WILL NOT OPEN DIRECTLY FROM THE ICON OR FROM THE GOOGLE PLAY STORE - YOU MUST APPLY IT THROUGH GO SMS PRO - CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD GO SMS PRO (it's FREE!)INCLUDED IN THIS GO SMS THEME:-Custom Inbox Background-Custom Chatroom Background-Custom Chat Bubbles-Custom SMS Popup Window-Custom Top Bar & Bottom Bar-Custom Text Interface-Custom Font Colors (if you do not like the font color that the themes comes with, you can customize the theme font and font colors in the settings menu under the "advanced" tab in Go SMS Pro.  This can be done with ANY Go SMS Pro theme).TO APPLY THIS THEME:Step 1: Install GO SMS PRO from the Market/Google Play (it's FREE!) Step 2: Open the GO SMS PRO application on your phoneStep 3: Hit "MENU"Step 4: Hit "THEMES"Step 5: Locate this theme's name/preview image until the INSTALLED tabStep 6: Click on the image preview or the one named the correct theme's nameStep 7: Hit "APPLY"Step 8: Hit the back button on your phone until you are brought back to the main inbox (the theme should now be applied)If you would like to subscribe to our website it will notify you when we upload new themes to the Google Play Store.  Also, if you need assistance with applying a theme, troubleshooting with any download issues or any other information please visit our website. WEBSITE:http://www.scscreations-chutedesigns.com/" target="_blank">www.scscreations-chutedesigns.comAlso, please add us to your Circles on Google + just search for scscreations@gmail.comIf you liked this theme, please check out our other creations by clicking here: SCSCreationsThank you for your support and let us know if you need any assistance.  :) Respectfully,SCSCreationsTags: go sms theme, black, white, pink zebra 2, zebra, hearts, pink,

reviews.title: Super cute!!! Love the idea
reviews.comment: I second the idea of the white background for text. It would make it even better, and maybe instead of black for the pop up window, animal print? Pink zeebra?? Cute themes though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loves it
reviews.comment: Beautiful!!!!!! Worth my money loves to show it off nd make friends jealous. Gorgeous on my HTC EVO Design 4g screen <3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: Literally THE best girls theme out there. I had to dig pretty hard to find it, but I love it! If only the panel under the text box were black rather than white. It would match the theme better, and be easier to read. But maybe im just too picky. Anyway, other than that, AWESOME!!!  :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work right.
reviews.comment: Text is black against a black background. Like this on all apps bought from this maker. Text is always the same color as the background . :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meow!!
reviews.comment: I am a 35yr old Goth gurrly and just love this theme!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cute but it doesn\'t let me install it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So Cute!
reviews.comment: I agree, could you add some animal print or something to the pop up window so it\'s not just all black like you did with the other themes that you made? Hopefully this is possible :-) still a very cute theme
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So cute .....love it! Looks great! Droid X2

reviews.comment: Pink is my favorite color, I Love it works GREAT!!!\nHTC EVO 3D
